channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Tree stump detritus not collected, at least 6 months, 29th August
item.description:
Council removed tree blocking driveway, paid for by home owner, then months later ground the stump, swept all the sawdust, and detritus that was left, into the road, and put cones on the heap, awaiting collection, This was done at least 6 months ago, please remove!east 6 minths ago, is now spreading. Please ensure it is finally collected and cleared asap, thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Tiverton Drive, New Eltham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Foliage overhanging public footpath, 29th August
item.description:

item.title: Missing WATTS WAY nameplate, 29th August
item.description:
